verses.verse: Ah,<WH1945> the land<WH776> of the rustling<WH6767> of wings,<WH3671> which is beyond<WH5676> the rivers<WH5104> of Ethiopia;<WH3568>

that sends<WH7971> ambassadors<WH6735> by the sea,<WH3220> even in vessels<WH3627> of papyrus<WH1573> on<WH6440> the waters,<WH4325> saying,<WH3212> "Go, you swift<WH7031> messengers,<WH4397> to a nation<WH1471> tall<WH4900> and smooth,<WH4178> to a people<WH5971> awesome<WH3372> from their beginning onward,<WH1973> a nation<WH1471> that measures out<WH6978> and treads down,<WH4001> whose land<WH776> the rivers<WH5104> divide!<WH958>"

All you inhabitants<WH3427> of the world,<WH8398> and you dwellers<WH7931> on the earth,<WH776> when a banner<WH5251> is lifted up<WH5375> on the mountains,<WH2022> look!<WH7200> When the trumpet<WH7782> is blown,<WH8628> listen!<WH8085>

For<WH3541> Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH8252> "I will be still, and I will see<WH5027> in my dwelling place,<WH4349> like clear<WH6703> heat<WH2527> in sunshine,<WH216> like a cloud<WH5645> of dew<WH2919> in the heat<WH2527> of harvest.<WH7105>"

For before<WH6440> the harvest,<WH7105> when the blossom<WH6525> is over,<WH8552> and the flower<WH5328> becomes a ripening<WH1580> grape,<WH1155> he will cut off<WH3772> the sprigs<WH2150> with pruning hooks,<WH4211> and he will cut down<WH8456> and take away<WH5493> the spreading branches.<WH5189>

They will be left<WH5800> together<WH3162> for the ravenous birds<WH5861> of the mountains,<WH2022> and for the animals<WH929> of the earth.<WH776> The ravenous birds<WH5861> will summer<WH6972> on them,<WH929> and all the animals of the earth<WH776> will winter on them.<WH2778>

In that time,<WH6256> a present<WH7862> will be brought<WH2986> to Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> from a people<WH5971> tall<WH4900> and smooth,<WH4178> even from a people<WH5971> awesome<WH3372> from their beginning onward,<WH1973> a nation<WH1471> that measures out<WH6978> and treads down,<WH4001> whose land<WH776> the rivers<WH5104> divide,<WH958> to the place<WH4725> of the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> Mount<WH2022> Zion.<WH6726>
